Name: emotional_detection_cbt
Title: Emotion-Aware CBT Guidance for AI Companions
Experiment: Design a module that detects emotional states from user input and responds with Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)-inspired techniques. Evaluate its ability to reduce distress and maintain engagement in early interaction stages.

Name: academic_mentor_lcm
Title: Personalized Academic Mentorship via Large Concept Models
Experiment: Implement an academic support module that recommends study strategies, resources, and schedules based on user academic profile, integrating retrieval-augmented generation and LLM fine-tuning.

Name: career_alignment_agent
Title: Career Path Optimization through Multi-Stage Dialogue and AI Reasoning
Experiment: Build a career-planning agent that assesses user skills, goals, and personality traits, then evolves a dynamic plan using LCM-based fusion of market data, user intent, and developmental milestones.

Name: modular_companion_fusion
Title: Modular AI Companion Design Using Evolving Concept Fusion
Experiment: Explore the fusion of specialized modules (mental health, academic, and career) using Sakanaâ€™s evolution-based concept recombination. Assess the adaptability and contextual relevance across life phases.
